text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System, 13-Foot,Hercules,LS234H" />

Item features:
Meets all applicable OSHA requirements
Exclusive Patented Stainless Steel Hinge Locks
Exclusive Integrated Anti-Twist Truss brace Supports
Super Lightweight
Meets or Exceeds All Applicable Requirements of the American National Standards Institute ANSI
text.Response A:
Attention: Hercules multipurpose ladder system
Interest: This ladder system is very safe, sturdy, and reliable.
Desire: I want to own this ladder system for my home.
Action: Click “Add to Cart” to purchase the Hercules multipurpose ladder system.
text.Response B: The Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System is a 13-foot ladder system that is super lightweight and easy to use.  It features an exclusive patented stainless steel hinge lock that keeps the ladder from twisting.  The integrated anti-twist brace supports the ladder as it is extended and provides extra support.  The ladder system meets or exceeds all applicable requirements of the American National Standards Institute ANSI.

59.displayed_text:
Prompt

Using the item features and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System, 13-Foot,Hercules,LS234H" />

Item features:
Meets all applicable OSHA requirements
Exclusive Patented Stainless Steel Hinge Locks
Exclusive Integrated Anti-Twist Truss brace Supports
Super Lightweight
Meets or Exceeds All Applicable Requirements of the American National Standards Institute ANSI

Response A

Attention: Hercules multipurpose ladder system
Interest: This ladder system is very safe, sturdy, and reliable.
Desire: I want to own this ladder system for my home.
Action: Click “Add to Cart” to purchase the Hercules multipurpose ladder system.

Response B

The Hercules LS234H Type II 225-Pound Duty Rated Multi-Position Ladder System is a 13-foot ladder system that is super lightweight and easy to use. It features an exclusive patented stainless steel hinge lock that keeps the ladder from twisting. The integrated anti-twist brace supports the ladder as it is extended and provides extra support. The ladder system meets or exceeds all applicable requirements of the American National Standards Institute ANSI.
